showScoreExcerpt:
"My third time with ‘The Great Comet’ was the best of all, especially because the environmental staging worked so well with the theater transformed into a mass of runways…With the constant swirling motion, the sung-through musical is clever, funny, sexy, and dizzyingly colorful, and blessed with a tip-top cast (including a very persuasive Josh Groban) that keeps your head Russian."
